FileFormat.FormatDescription: Draco is a library for compressing and decompressing 3D geometric meshes and point clouds. It is intended to provide efficient storage and transmission of 3D graphics.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF: 'DRACO', major version 1 Header defined in code: https://github.com/google/draco/blob/master/compression/config/compression_shared.h
